2024-12-01.title: December 1st
2024-12-01.message: The snow falls on dragon wings, let's see what today brings.
2024-12-01.task: Write a wallpost about what your character loves about the winter.  When you've done that, write a comment below.

2024-12-02.title: December 2nd
2024-12-02.message: The Jade Mountain Academy hides a lot of secrets, so make sure you don't leave without any regrets...
2024-12-02.task: Today I want you to solve a riddle at The Peacemaker's Riddles. When you've done that, make sure to send a letter to Zeke Damaris telling him you've done the task for December 2nd. Write 'Advent Calendar' as the topic of the letter.

2024-12-03.title: December 3rd
2024-12-03.message: The stars are shining very bright, are you ready for a fight?
2024-12-03.task: Today's assignment is to attend one lesson and do the assignment. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same one as before) and let him know which subject, year, and week you wrote your assignment for.

2024-12-04.title: December 4th
2024-12-04.message: It's important to be nice, because otherwise you might fall on ice.
2024-12-04.task: Write something you like about someone on their wall. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same one as before) and let him know who's wall you wrote on.

2024-12-05.title: December 5th
2024-12-05.message: Remember to cuddle pets shouldn't be hard, unless you want them to run a couple of yards.
2024-12-05.task: Give a pet some love. Find a person who owns a pet and cuddle it. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before) and let him know you cuddled a pet

2024-12-06.title: December 6th
2024-12-06.message: A present is always appreciated, and sometimes it can be sophisticated
2024-12-06.task: Send a gift to someone. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before) and let him know you sent a gift too and what you sent them

2024-12-07.title: December 7th
2024-12-07.message: Somedays don't go as planned, but that we all should understand
2024-12-07.task: Let me know your favorite Wings of Fire character and why.  As always, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before).

2024-12-08.title: December 8th
2024-12-08.message: Writing is something we all treasure; it's a gift beyond all measure.
2024-12-08.task: Write a Christmas poem and post it on your wall. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before)

2024-12-09.title: December 9th
2024-12-09.message: Through snowy nights, the dragon floats, spreading joy with fiery quotes.
2024-12-09.task: Give us your best Wings of Fire Quotes. Send it through a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before)

2024-12-10.title: December 10th
2024-12-10.message: When you have a lot of imagination, you might end up with a new relation
2024-12-10.task: Today I want you to take part in a roleplay. Either create a new topic or join someone else. When you've done that, send the link to the topic to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter).

2024-12-11.title: December 11th
2024-12-11.message: All characters need a good history, and who knows, they might uncover a mystery.
2024-12-11.task: Today I want you to take some time and add something new to your background history. It might be about when your character first entered the Jade Mountain Academy, or what they experienced since they joined the Academy. When you've added something new to your background history, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same as before) and let him know what you added.

2024-12-12.title: December 12th
2024-12-12.message: Sometimes we make mistakes, but don't give up and do whatever it takes.
2024-12-12.task: Today I want to know your favorite animal from Cutie and the Beast. Write a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same as before) and let him know your favorite animal.

2024-12-13.title: December 13th
2024-12-13.message: Art is the language where dragons speak, with colors bold and visions unique.
2024-12-13.task: Today I want you to make a fanart connected to The Wings of Fire Fandom, and if you're lucky we'll publish it to our social media. Send the image and a text about what it is to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter). You can use https://imgbb.com/ to upload the image

2024-12-14.title: December 14th
2024-12-14.message: Snow is falling from the sky, making it harder flying high
2024-12-14.task: Today I want you to change your FC to something with a Christmas / snowy theme. When you done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same as before) and let him know what you changed into.

2024-12-15.title: December 15th
2024-12-15.message: Appreciation is always good, make a user from the staff happy as they should
2024-12-15.task: Today I want you to make one of our student staff happy by writing something nice on their wall. When you're done, send a letter to Zeke Damaris and let him know whose wall you wrote on

2024-12-16.title: December 16th
2024-12-16.message: Make a graduate staff happy, unless you want them to feel crappy
2024-12-16.task: Today I want you to make one of our graduate staff happy by writing something nice on their wall. When you're done, send a letter to Zeke Damaris and let him know whose wall you wrote on

2024-12-17.title: December 17th
2024-12-17.message: Du öppnade Lucka 17! Här är din överraskning!

2024-12-18.message: Du öppnade Lucka 18! Här är din överraskning!
